method.name: HasDataToMigrate
method.tp:docstring: Returns whether the host-side /home/root/<hash>/android-data/data has any meaningful data to be migrated in the ARCVM /data migration. This method is not supposed to be called during the migration.

method.name: GetAndroidDataSize
method.tp:docstring: Measures and returns the total size of the files under the host-side /home/root/<hash>/android-data/data.

method.name: StartMigration
method.tp:docstring: Starts ARCVM /data migration. This first mounts the ext4 disk image of Android /data on host, and then triggers the copying of the entire /home/root/<hash>/android-data/data on host to the mount point.

signal.name: DataMigrationProgress
signal.tp:docstring: Signals sent out to report the progress of the migration. This is sent during and at the end of the migration.
